name: cfexchangeconnection
description:
Opens or closes a persistent connection to an Microsoft Exchange server.
 You must have a persistent or temporary connection to use the cfexchangecalendar,
 cfexchangecontact, cfexchangemail, and cfexchangetask tags to get or change
 information on the Exchange server.

params.name: action
params.description: The action to take. Must be open or close. (required)

params.name: connection
params.description:
The name of the connection. You specify this ID when you close the connection
 and in tags such as cfexchangemail. (required)

params.name: mailboxName
params.description:
The ID of the Exchange mailbox to use.
 Specify this attribute to access a mailbox whose owner has delegated access
 rights to the account specified in the username attribute. (optional)

params.name: password
params.description: (open) The users password for accessing the Exchange server. (optional)

params.name: port
params.description: The port on the server connect to, most commonly port 80. (optional)

params.name: protocol
params.description: The protocol to use for the connection. Valid values are http and https. (optional)

params.name: proxyHost
params.description: The URL or IP address of the proxy host required for access to the network. (optional)

params.name: proxyPort
params.description: The port on the proxy server to connect to, most commonly port 80. (optional)

params.name: server
params.description: The IP address or URL of the server that is providing access to Exchange. (required)

params.name: folder
params.description: The forward slash (/) delimited path from the root of the mailbox to the folder for which to get subfolders.

params.name: recurse
params.description:
* true: get information on the immediate subfolders of the specified folder only.
 * false: get information on all levels of subfolders of the specified folder.

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the ColdFusion query variable that contains information about the subfolders.

params.name: exchangeServerLanguage
params.description: The language of the Exchange server. Default is English.

params.name: formBasedAuthentication
params.description: A Boolean value that specifies whether to display a login form and use form based authentication when making the connection.
